craftable.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
craftable.desc: Deal 20.0% bonus damage.

craftable.name: Infinity Edge
craftable.desc:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10.0% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craftable.name: Protector's Vow
craftable.desc: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts 5 seconds and gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

craftable.name: Redemption
craftable.desc:
Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 10% less damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

Healing: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Tracker_Value1@

craftable.name: Thief's Gloves
craftable.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

craftable.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
craftable.desc: Attacks grant 5% stacking Attack Speed.

craftable.name: Ionic Spark
craftable.desc:
30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 160% of their maximum Mana.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craftable.name: Sterak's Gage
craftable.desc: Once per combat at 60% Health, gain 25% max Health and 35% Attack Damage.

craftable.name: Dragon's Claw
craftable.desc:
Gain 9.0% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 5% max Health.

craftable.name: Guardbreaker
craftable.desc: After damaging a Shield, deal 25% more damage for 3 seconds.

craftable.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
craftable.desc: Gain 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

craftable.name: Bramble Vest
craftable.desc:
Gain 5.0% max health.

Take 8.0% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: 2 seconds

craftable.name: Giant Slayer
craftable.desc: Deal 25% more damage to enemies with more than 1750 maximum Health.

craftable.name: Sunfire Cape
craftable.desc:
Every 2 seconds, deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 2 hexes for 10 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craftable.name: Hand Of Justice
craftable.desc:
Gain 2 effects:
  • 15.0% Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power.
  • 15% Omnivamp.

    Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

    Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

craftable.name: Edge of Night
craftable.desc:
Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, gain 15% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craftable.name: Titan's Resolve
craftable.desc:
Gain 2.0% Attack Damage and 1 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

craftable.name: Runaan's Hurricane
craftable.desc: Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 55% Attack Damage %i:scaleAD% as physical damage.

craftable.name: Bloodthirster
craftable.desc:
Gain 20% Omnivamp.

Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

craftable.name: Archangel's Staff
craftable.desc: Combat start: Gain 30 Ability Power every 5 seconds in combat.

craftable.name: Spear of Shojin
craftable.desc: Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana.

craftable.name: Evenshroud
craftable.desc:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 10 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

craftable.name: Nashor's Tooth
craftable.desc: After casting an Ability, gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

craftable.name: Morellonomicon
craftable.desc:
Attacks and Abilities deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to enemies for 10 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craftable.name: Red Buff
craftable.desc:
Deal 6.0% bonus damage.

Attacks and Abilities 1% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craftable.name: Crownguard
craftable.desc:
Combat start: Gain a 30% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.
When the shield expires, gain 35 Ability Power.

craftable.name: Adaptive Helm
craftable.desc:
Combat start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position.

Front Two Rows: 40 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 20 Ability Power. Gain 10 Mana every 3 seconds.

craftable.name: Blue Buff
craftable.desc:
Max mana reduced by 10.

When the holder gets a takedown, they deal 8.0% more damage for 8 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craftable.name: Last Whisper
craftable.desc:
Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Sunder: Reduce Armor

craftable.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
craftable.desc:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10.0% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craftable.desc:
Take 8% less damage. While above 50.0% Health, take 15% less damage, instead.

craftable.name: Tactician's Crown
craftable.desc: Your team gains +1 maximum team size.

craftable.desc: Deal 8.0% bonus damage.

artifact.name: Innervating Locket
artifact.desc:
The holder gains 2% of their total Mana whenever they're hit by an attack.

Each cast restores 20% of the holder's max Health over 3 seconds.

artifact.name: Hullcrusher
artifact.desc: Combat start: If there are no adjacent allies, gain 600 Health.

artifact.name: Manazane
artifact.desc:
After casting the first time in combat, gain 120 Mana over 5 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

artifact.name: Gambler's Blade
artifact.desc:
Grant %i:scaleAS% 3.0% bonus Attack Speed per %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank (up to %i:goldCoins% 15 gold).

Each attack has a 10.0% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Gold generated this game: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Item_GoldGenerated@

artifact.name: Gambler's Blade
artifact.desc:
Grant %i:scaleAS% 1.0% bonus Attack Speed per %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank (up to %i:goldCoins% 30 gold).

Each attack has a 4.0% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Gold generated this game: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Item_GoldGenerated@

artifact.name: Determined Investor
artifact.desc: After dying during combat 8 times, this item is destroyed. Upon destruction, grant the item Diamond Hands, 1 Champion Duplicator, and %i:goldCoins% 5 gold.

artifact.name: Diamond Hands
artifact.desc:
Once per combat: At 50.0% Health, become invulnerable for 1.5 seconds and grant %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

artifact.name: Trickster's Glass
artifact.desc:
Summon a clone with 70% max Health and +30.0% max Mana. You cannot equip items to the clone.

The clone benefits from active traits

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

artifact.name: Lich Bane
artifact.desc:
The holder's first attack after each ability cast deals @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Item_Artifact_LichBane_Damage@ bonus magic damage.

Damage increases based on Stage

artifact.name: Forbidden Idol
artifact.desc: Shields have 50% of their value converted to max Health instead.

artifact.name: Fishbones
artifact.desc: Doubles the holder's attack range, and causes each of their attacks to target a random enemy.

artifact.name: Anima Visage
artifact.desc: Heal 2.5% max Health every second.

artifact.name: Unending Despair
artifact.desc: Whenever a Shield on the holder breaks, 125% of that Shield's initial value is dealt to the nearest enemy as magic damage.

artifact.name: Eternal Winter
artifact.desc:
Enemies who damage the holder are 20% Chilled for 1.5 seconds. After 7 Chills from this item, the attacker is Stunned instead (Cooldown: 15 seconds).

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Chill: reduce Attack Speed
Stun: cannot move, attack, or cast Abilities

artifact.name: Zhonya's Paradox
artifact.desc:
Once per combat at 40% Health, become invulnerable and untargetable for 3 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

artifact.name: Luden's Tempest
artifact.desc: 100% of overkill damage plus 100 is dealt as magic damage to the three enemies nearest the target.

artifact.name: Spectral Cutlass
artifact.desc: Combat Start: Teleports the holder to the mirrored hex on the enemy's side of the board. After 8 seconds, the holder returns to their original location.

artifact.name: Rapid Firecannon
artifact.desc: Gain +1 Attack Range, increased by 1 whenever the holder kills an enemy.

artifact.name: Sniper's Focus
artifact.desc: Gain %i:scaleRange% 1 Attack Range. Damage is increased by 9% for each hex between the holder and their target.

artifact.name: Lightshield Crest
artifact.desc:
Every 3 seconds, Shields the lowest percent Health ally for 50% of the holder's combined Armor and Magic Resist.

On death grants this shield to all allies.

artifact.name: Death's Defiance
artifact.desc:
Gain 25% Omnivamp. 50% of the damage the holder receives is instead dealt over 4 seconds as non-lethal damage.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

artifact.name: Blacksmith's Gloves
artifact.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random Ornn Artifacts.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

artifact.name: Blighting Jewel
artifact.desc: Dealing magic damage reduces the target's Magic Resist by 4. If their Magic Resist is 0, this grants the holder 5 Mana instead.

artifact.name: Talisman Of Ascension
artifact.desc: After 22 seconds gain 100% max Health and 120% increased damage for the rest of combat.

artifact.name: Infinity Force
artifact.desc: <tftitemrules>Tons of EVERYTHING!</tftitemrules>

artifact.name: Suspicious Trench Coat
artifact.desc:
Once per combat at 50% Health, the holder splits into three copies of themself each with 33% of their max Health.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

artifact.name: Mittens
artifact.desc:
Shrinks the holder, granting them increased movement speed, 20% damage reduction, and immunity to Chill.

Chill: reduce Attack Speed

artifact.name: Deathfire Grasp
artifact.desc:
Combat start: Blast the current target for 20.0% of their max Health as magic damage.

For the next 10 seconds, deal 25.0% more damage. Damage dealt to the blasted target is increased to 35.0%.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

artifact.name: Corrupt Vampiric Scepter
artifact.desc:
Attacks deal an additional 50% Attack Damage %i:scaleAD% as physical damage and heal the holder for the damage dealt.

The holder cannot cast their ability or gain mana.

artifact.name: Wit's End
artifact.desc:
Attacks deal @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Item_Artifact_WitsEnd_Damage@ bonus magic damage.

Heals the holder for 35% of all magic damage dealt.

Damage increases based on Stage

artifact.name: Horizon Focus
artifact.desc: Stunning an enemy causes lightning to strike them, dealing 30% of their max Health as magic damage.

artifact.name: Prowler's Claw
artifact.desc: After killing a target, shed negative effects and dash to the farthest target within 4 hexes. The next two critical attacks deal 60% bonus critical strike damage.

artifact.name: Silvermere Dawn
artifact.desc:
Grants immunity to stuns and the holder's attacks stun the target for 0.8 seconds.

The holder's attack speed is locked at 0.5.

artifact.name: Seeker's Armguard
artifact.desc: Takedowns increase the holder's Armor, Magic Resist, and Ability Power by 10, increased to 15 if they score the kill.

artifact.name: Gold Collector
artifact.desc:
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below 12% of their maximum Health. Executions have a 40% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

support.name: Zz'Rot Portal
support.desc:
Summon a large Voidspawn. Its strength increases with each Stage.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

support.desc:

Your team gains 60 Health.

​​[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]
Mana Reave: increase maximum Mana until the next cast

support.name: Banshee's Veil
support.desc:
Combat start: Grant the holder and allies within 1 hexes in the same row immunity to crowd control and 25.0% Attack Speed for 18 seconds.

[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]

support.name: Zephyr
support.desc:
Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

Your team gains 8% Attack Speed.

[Support item]
[Ignores crowd control immunity.]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]

support.desc:
If the holder is alive after 15 seconds of combat, grant living allies 40.0% bonus damage.

​​[Support item]

support.desc:
Damage dealt 30% Shreds and 30% Sunders enemies for 15 seconds.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

support.desc:
Every 5 seconds, heal your team for 7% of their max Health. When the holder dies, the healing increases to 14% max Health and for 2 additional heals.

​​[Support item]

support.name: Knight's Vow
support.desc:
Combat start: Grant 200 Health and 15.0% Omnivamp to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

​​[Support item]

support.name: Unstable Treasure Chest

When the holder dies, the 3 closest allies gain a temporary completed item.

​​[Support item]

support.name: The Eternal Flame
support.desc:
While the holder is alive, all enemies are 33% Wounded and all allies deal 8.0% more damage. This effect refreshes every 5 seconds.

support.desc:

​​[Support item]

support.desc:
When this unit dies, reduce the Attack Damage and Ability Power of enemy units within 2-hexes by 25.0% for 15 seconds.

Allies within the explosion range gain 40.0% Attack Damage and Ability Power for the same duration.

​​[Support item]

support.desc:

30% Sunder enemies within 3 hexes. Gain 50 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 15 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

special.name: Zenith Edge
special.desc:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10.0% Critical Strike Damage instead.

special.name: Luminous Deathblade
special.desc: Deal <TFTRadiantItemBonus>12.0%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> bonus damage.

special.name: Jak'sho the Protean
special.desc:
Combat start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position.

Front Two Rows: 80 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 2 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 55 Ability Power. Gain 20 Mana every 3 seconds.

special.name: Critical Hit!
special.desc: Grants the champion 100% critical strike chance, and their spell can critically strike.

special.name: Zz'Rot Portal
special.desc:
Combat start: Taunt.
On death, a Voidspawn arises, Taunting nearby enemies. The Voidspawn has massively reduced effectiveness when created by a summoned unit.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter
